name: Intentlyco-RequestAnyServiceAnywhere
0:
”Alexa, tell intently dot co I need a plumber in San Francisco”
”Alexa, ask intently dot co to request guitar lessons in New York”
”Alexa, tell intently dot co I would like a wedding venue in Denver”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: intently dot co
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Whatever service you need, just ask Intently.co via Amazon Alexa.

We have over 1 million service providers waiting to help you today, including plumbers, handymen, cleaners, hotels, cosmetic surgeons, caterers, language teachers, photographers, limo companies, venues for hire, and wedding services.

You just have to state the service you require and your location, and we'll connect you with qualified service providers in minutes.
